copy.response_0_0: Did you know I make perfumes, sugar? That's right, from flower petals of all kinds!
copy.response_0_1: Roses, daisies, pansies, lilies -- why, I even made perfume from a cactus flower once!
copy.response_0_2: Didn't like it. Smelled sorta... prickly.
copy.response_1_0: My full name is Rosetta, but my friends sometimes call me Ro.
copy.response_1_1: And speaking of friends, you come visit me any time you want to! I'm usually right here in my garden!
copy.response_2_0: Let me give you a beauty tip, sugar -- always take care of your skin. You want to look good, don't you?
copy.response_2_1: I just love my rose beauty cream and my rose hand lotion and my rose moisturizer and --
copy.response_2_2: Hm. Guess I really like roses, huh?
copy.response_3_0: Did you know that Bess the art-talent painted my picture once? I have it hanging over my desk at home. It's absolutely beautiful!
copy.response_3_1: Not that I'm bragging. I mean, the PICTURE is beautiful. I mean, I think I look pretty good and all, but I was talking about the paintin' itself. I mean --
copy.response_3_2: Oh, never mind, sugar. I'm just gonna dig myself in a hole here.
copy.response_4_0: Hey, sugar, have you ever noticed that there are Lady Bugs but no Gentleman Bugs? Don't you think that's odd?
copy.response_4_1: There MUST be Gentleman Bugs somewhere!
copy.response_4_2: Iridessa likes to solve mysteries. Maybe she and I can get together some time and look for Gentlemen Bugs...
copy.response_5_0: Let's see here, I got my leaf clippers and my acorn shovel and my petal bucket and my waterin' can.
copy.response_5_1: I'm all set for a day in my garden!
copy.response_5_2: Oops! Forgot my lemongrass tea. I just can't garden without a nice tall glass of lemongrass tea, now can I?
